mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Pattle, James W.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Xenia, Green Co., O [Xenia, Greene County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Pattle, James W. Patient Age: 24. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Chronic rheumatism. Treatment: Iodide patassium saturated solution with wine of [colchicine] = fine quinine load = chloroform luminent - convalescing . Result: Tranferred to US Genl Hospital Parkersburg VA [West Virginia] 1864/09/29.
